title: 2 bedroom apartment
posting_body: ['2 Bedroom 1 Bath apartment connected to the pool building.', 'Newly renovated unit with Gas stove, Dishwasher.', 'Our community offers:', '• Onsite management • 24 hour maintenance', '• Controlled access entries • Lot Parking', '• Indoor swimming pool and hot tub • Community room', '• Fitness center • Additional Storage', '• Wifi Lounge • Movie library', '• Package acceptance', '• Air conditioning in each unit • Dishwasher in each unit', '• Heat included in rent', 'o Resident pays: water/sewer/trash, electric, cable/internet (optional), renter’s insurance (required)', '• Spacious Balconies/Patios', '• $50 application fee • Deposit starts at $500 (due at time of application)', '\uf0a7 $150 admin fee charged at move in', '• Pet friendly • Max 2 pets', '• $250 non-refundable pet fee • Cat rent $25 / Dog rent $50 (some breed restrictions)', '• New Dog Run']
